TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Canvas extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel

summary.span: 定义一个区域，在该区域中可以使用相对于 区域的坐标显式定位子元素。

span.span: Defines an area within which you can explicitly position child elements by using coordinates that are relative to the area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个包含一系列对象，后者是在属性。A contains a collection of objects, which are in the property. 是唯一的面板元素具有没有固有的布局特征。 is the only panel element that has no inherent layout characteristics. 一个具有默认值和属性为零，除非它是元素的子级的自动调整大小及其子元素。A has default and properties of zero, unless it is the child of an element that automatically sizes its child elements. 子元素的是永远不会调整大小时，它们只位于指定的坐标处。Child elements of a are never resized, they are just positioned at their designated coordinates. 这提供了灵活性的固有的大小调整约束或对齐方式的情况下不需要或不想。This provides flexibility for situations in which inherent sizing constraints or alignment are not needed or wanted. 对于要在其中子内容自动调整大小和对齐的情况下，它是通常最好使用元素。For cases in which you want child content to be automatically resized and aligned, it is usually best to use a element. 属性确定共享相同的坐标空间的子元素的显示的顺序。The property determines the order in which child elements that share the same coordinate space appear. 更高一个子元素的值指示此元素将出现上面具有较低的值的另一个子元素。A higher value for one child element indicates that this element will appear above another child element that has a lower value. 如果你指定它们的附加属性或优先于或属性。If you specify them, the attached properties or take priority over the or properties. 子元素的总是会获得他们所需的完整大小。Child elements of a are always given the full size that they desire. 因此，垂直对齐方式和水平对齐方式不起作用内。As a result, vertical alignment and horizontal alignment have no effect inside a . 是可用于子内容的绝对定位的顶级布局控件。 is a top-level layout control that you can use for absolute positioning of child content. 对于绘图和绘画，使用画笔并不需要使用。For painting and drawing, you use brushes and do not have to use a . 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用纯色和渐变概述进行绘制](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-solid-colors-and-gradients-overview.md)。For more information, see [Painting with Solid Colors and Gradients Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-solid-colors-and-gradients-overview.md). 默认情况下，panel 元素不接收焦点。By default, panel elements do not receive focus. 若要强制面板元素接收焦点，设置属性设置为`true`。To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例生成三个元素，每个元素等于 100 个像素。The following example produces three elements, each element 100 pixels. 第一个为红色，其左上角 (*x，y*) 位置指定为 （0，0）。The first is red, and its upper-left (*x, y*) position is specified as (0, 0). 第二个为绿色，其左上角位置为 （100，100），这是正下方和右侧的第一个方形。The second is green, and its upper-left position is (100, 100), which is just below, and to the right of, the first square. 第三个为蓝色，其左上角位置为 （50，50）。The third is blue, and its upper-left position is (50, 50). 因此，第三个介绍了第一个的右下象限和第二个左上四分之一部分。Hence, the third covers the lower-right quadrant of the first and the upper-left quadrant of the second. 因为第三个的布局查看上一次，它似乎是在其他两个正方形上面 — 即，重叠部分采用第三个颜色。Because the third is laid out last, it appears to be on top of the other two squares—that is, the overlapping portions assume the color of the third . [!code-csharp[CanvasOvwSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasOvwSample/CSharp/Canvas_Ovw_Sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CanvasOvwSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasOvwSample/VisualBasic/canvas_vb.vb#1)] [!code-xaml[CanvasOvwSample#1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasOvwSample/XAML/default.xaml#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示某元素的下边缘与其父 的下边缘之间的距离。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the distance between the bottom of an element and the bottom of its parent .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子元素的偏移量不会影响父对象的大小。The offset of a child element does not affect the size of a parent . 如果你指定它们的附加属性或优先于或属性。If you specify them, the attached properties or take priority over the or properties. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
